posts.post_content:
Won this auction hoping SGC would agree the signature was authentic, but they like JSA according to this auction description rendered an “inconclusive” determination.  

[url]http://auction.sigauctions.com/lot-99350.aspx[/url]

I still think it is authentic, but am willing to take a loss of nearly $150 here because I couldn’t get it slabbed by SGC.  Maybe PSA or Beckett will slab it for you and make it worth $750-$1,000.  If I can’t sell it for $250, maybe I will try...

$old

Email me at [url]SignedT206@gmail.com[/url] if you’re interested.
